short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically generate stand-up reports from Jira and GitHub activities
short.ko: React, Typescript, Vite를 사용한 크롬 익스텐션 보일러플레이트입니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grab Jira tickets, Github PRs, and Google Calendar events for you. And use AI to generate the stand-up for you.
